meanings.definition: The action of renting property or goods.
meanings.sent1: I visited the rentals office to inquire about apartment availability.
meanings.sent2: The rentals in the city are quite expensive due to high demand.
meanings.sent3: The rentals office was so busy that they ran out of rental agreements!
meanings.sent4: His business thrived by offering affordable rentals to those in need.
meanings.sent5: The colorful sign outside the rentals office caught my eye immediately.

meanings.definition: Properties or goods that are available for rent.
meanings.sent1: The beachfront rentals were fully booked for the summer season.
meanings.sent2: She decided to invest in rentals as a source of passive income.
meanings.sent3: The rentals included everything from cozy apartments to spacious villas.
meanings.sent4: The company expanded its portfolio to include luxury rentals in popular tourist destinations.
meanings.sent5: The rentals were beautifully furnished and ready for immediate occupancy.
